pages.text: $(thing)Guns$() are the more modern version of $(l:aoa3:bows#bows)bows$(/l) in $(thing)Minecraft$().$(br)Offering a far higher fire rate and moderate damage, in exchange for higher ammunition cost.$(br2)Each $(thing)gun$() has its own ammunition requirement, so be sure to check before using it.
pages.title: Guns

pages.text: To fire a $(thing)gun$(), ensure you have at least one of the ammo that it needs (shown in the tooltip), and right click with it in your main hand.$(br2)Each $(thing)gun$() has its own fire rate, recoil, and other characteristics, so firing off a few test shots before putting it to use might be worthwhile.
$(thing)Guns$() fire fast-moving, accurate projectiles that deal rapid damage at the cost of ammunition.
pages.title: A Gun

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)guns$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().'
pages.title: Read More
